attributes.action: MP's should not be allowed to have private medical treatment
attributes.additional_details: Government really not aware of the state of the NHS because if you never need to use it you will never know how bad it is.
attributes.background: MP's are not aware of how bad the NHS really is.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for individuals.
